name: tearoom
description: Advanced conversational AI platform where multiple Claude instances chat with distinct personalities

scripts.db:seed: node -e "const db = require('./server/database/database'); const seeders = require('./server/database/seeders'); db.initialize().then(() => seeders.seedDevelopmentData()).then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(err => { console.error(err); process.exit(1); })"
scripts.db:clear: node -e "const db = require('./server/database/database'); const seeders = require('./server/database/seeders'); db.initialize().then(() => seeders.clearAllData()).then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(err => { console.error(err); process.exit(1); })"
